parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Name of the file to which to save the points

title: ITablePatternFeatureData.SavePointsToFile
description: Saves the location of the table-driven pattern feature's points to a *.sldptab file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Name of the file to which to save the points

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks: Exported units, e.g. meters, of the document that owns the feature, and not necessarily those of the active document, are used when data is saved to a file.
